data.title: Edmonton General Continuing Care Centre
data.meta_description: The Edmonton General Continuing Care Centre provides compassionate long-term care, subacute care and hospice care for nearly 500 people in downtown Edmonton.
data.text:
Amenities for residents

Meals

We serve sit-down meals three times a day in our dining rooms. We try to offer you choice of food during every meal.

Basic cable

Basic cable is available in your room for a small fee. You are welcome to arrange for extra services with our cable provider. Speak to your resident care manager for information.

Laundry

We offer laundry services. Speak to your resident care manager for information.

Hair salon

Our beauty salon is located on the main floor. Phone: 780.342.8032 to make an appointment. Residents and walk-ins are also welcome.

Hours: Tuesday-Thursday, 9:30 a.m.-2 p.m.

Resident and family council

We have a resident and family council that meets regularly. The council is a way to share information, talk about concerns and work together to improve the quality of life at our centre.

Suites

We offer private and semiprivate rooms. Each room has an accessible washroom.

Common areas

Gymnasium

We have a large gymnasium on our main floor where you can enjoy concerts, social events and more.

Visiting areas

There are several spaces for visiting with other residents, family and friends.

Chapel

Our chapel is open to you and your visitors for quiet reflection and prayer.

Special features

Gardens

We have garden spaces at our centre, including on top of our building. You are welcome to help plant or simply enjoy them as they grow.

Tuck shop

We have a small store on our main floor where you can buy snacks and other items.

Private meeting rooms

There are special rooms in our centre for private meetings with your family and friends.

Neighbourhood

We are located in downtown Edmonton close to grocery stores, restaurants, churches and other services.

There is an Edmonton Transit bus stop on the north side of our building.
